channel.title: Singletons on Philip John Madeley | Interaction Designer
channel.description: Recent content in Singletons on Philip John Madeley | Interaction Designer

item.title: About
item.description: Temp Folder Example Page This is a sample “singleton” page. The URL is decided by the title in the front matter of the markdown file. The singleton_stylesheet: in the front matter points to a corresponding file with the same name in static/css/singletons-stylesheets, which will pipe the appropriate stylesheet in after the site-wild stylesheet in cases where you make want to create one-off pages with URLs at the root of your site.

item.title: Sample Singleton

The singleton_stylesheet: in the front matter points to a corresponding file with the same name in static/css/singletons-stylesheets, which will pipe the appropriate stylesheet in after the site-wild stylesheet in cases where you make want to create one-off pages with URLs at the root of your site.
